title: How to be found by data-driven VCs

moderators.name: Prof. Dr. Thomas Andressen
moderators.role: Professor for Business Informatics - Supply Chain Management and ERP-Systems
moderators.description: Digital Transformation Expert with Doctor Degree in Economics: 20+ years of Experience in Banking, CPG, Chemical Industry and Mining. Senior Executive in Procurement, Controlling and Operations, home based in Germany, U.S., and Canada.

speakers.name: Tanja Jänicke
speakers.description: Tanja Jänicke is the Head of Research & Academic Partnerships at Morphais. She has an academic background in behavioral science and decision making. She leads Morphais’ research activities and grows Morphais’ academic network with the aim to find outstanding founders with a data-driven...
